author: travelandtourworld.com
title: European Waterways Announces Early Booking; Specials Of 10% Off For Spring 2016 Cruises - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
European Waterways Announces Early Booking; Specials Of 10% Off For Spring 2016 Cruises Published on : Thursday, September 10, 2015
European Waterways, Europe’s premier luxury hotel barge cruising company, is offering 10% off per cabin for many of its all-inclusive, luxury hotel barge cruises in the Spring 2016 season. Full-boat charters for families or small groups during the same period are also available at 10% off. Bookings must be made by December 31, 2015.
For example, a 6-night cruise on board the elegant, 8-passenger Anjodi on the historic Canal du Midi in the South of France, departing on April 3 or April 10, is reduced from $4,690 to $4,220 per person, based on double occupancy. A full-boat charter for a family or group of up to eight passengers is reduced from $35,000 to $31,500 – representing even more of a saving per person.
The cruises feature a crew of four, including a gourmet chef, and include all gourmet meals, fine wines, open bar, daily escorted excursions, and opportunities for independent exploration on the barges’ bicycles.
